ygData.subject: Re: wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Tomb that I can barely read right now but it speaks of being able to create Invisibility, Shadow Step, Bandages...and numerous others.  Most of the
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Tomb that I can barely read right now but it speaks of being able
to create "Invisibility, Shadow Step, Bandages...and numerous others. Most
of the spells I can eventually create from this Tome's knowledge are going
to rank 1-3 spells. This means I can sell them to younger mages at a
reduced price from the merchants.

- Ziffnab
17th Wizard of Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee [mailto:kenlee@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 3:07 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: wizard spells


From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>

I wouldn't worry about that just as yet. You won't start getting the ability
to 'create' spells till level 16, and the ones that you can create are I
believe are over 20th lvl. Unless you're a complete hardcore EQ player, and
have the ability to spend over 8 hours a day playing, you're not going to
hit 16th+ in less than 2 weeks. I've been playing for a month and I'm just
hitting 16 now.

Zalbar
15th Wizard
Solusek Ro
